医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示心理健康病假后重返工作岗位的道德冲突因常见精神障碍病假后重返工作岗位是一个固有的伦理冲突和潜在困境的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Study-reveals-ethical-conflicts-in-return-to-work-after-mental-health-sick-leave.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Study-reveals-ethical-conflicts-in-return-to-work-after-mental-health-sick-leave.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9d26661-9394-40f9-9532-46b976c0487e Mon, 20 Jan 2025 09:43:00 -0500 Study reveals ethical conflicts in return to work after mental health sick leave
面对面的锻炼计划可改善心脏病患者的心理健康身体活动，尤其是通过面对面的活动，可以减少这些患者的抑郁和焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Face-to-face-exercise-programs-improve-mental-health-in-heart-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Face-to-face-exercise-programs-improve-mental-health-in-heart-disease-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe3b56ab-88d2-461d-9442-6c7437109823 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 09:25:30 -0500 Face-to-face exercise programs improve mental health in heart disease patients
微血管过度扩张可能导致慢性肢体缺血库奥皮奥大学医院和东芬兰大学最近的研究表明，肌肉微脉管系统持续过度扩张可能是导致慢性肢体威胁性缺血的原因之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Over-dilation-of-microvasculature-may-contribute-to-chronic-limb-throne-ischemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Over-dilation-of-microvasculature-may-contribute-to-chronic-limb-throne-ischemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30b2bd47-ccd5-40b5-8909-a13b09fe6642 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 09:18:47 -0500 Over-dilation of microvasculature may contribute to chronic limb-threatening ischemia
探索基于共焦的高内涵成像在推进核心设施中的作用在本次采访中，NewsMedical 与横河生命科学公司的 Esther Kieserman 和 Arvonn Tully 讨论了基于共焦的高内涵成像如何推进核心设施研究并提高数据可靠性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Exploring-the-role-of-confocal-based-high-content-imaging-in-advancing-core-facilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Exploring-the-role-of-confocal-based-high-content-imaging-in-advancing-core-facilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e772345-dca6-4f1b-9aba-eb8c38985a78 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 09:00:00 -0500 Exploring the role of confocal-based high-content imaging in advancing core facilities
肠道炎症可以解释牛皮癣患者的胃肠道问题乌普萨拉大学的最新研究表明，患有皮肤病牛皮癣的人通常会在小肠中出现看不见的炎症，并且“肠漏”的可能性增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Inflammation-in-the-gut-could-explain-胃肠道问题-in-psoriasis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Inflammation-in-the-gut-could-explain-胃肠道问题-in-psoriasis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65a44c19-9d85-4942-826a-dce1213319ce Mon, 20 Jan 2025 08:43:00 -0500 Inflammation in the gut could explain gastrointestinal problems in psoriasis patients
肌间脂肪会增加患心脏病的风险，与体重指数无关根据今天（周一）发表在《欧洲心脏杂志》上的研究，无论体重指数如何，肌肉中隐藏着大量脂肪的人因心脏病发作或心力衰竭而死亡或住院的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Intermuscular-fat-increases-risk-of-heart-disease-independent-of-BMI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Intermuscular-fat-increases-risk-of-heart-disease-independent-of-BMI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9820e684-6290-419c-a2ed-5942347d9269 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 08:30:00 -0500 Intermuscular fat increases risk of heart disease independent of BMI
投资青少年心理健康可带来长期经济和社会效益研究表明，支持青少年心理健康是一项具有成本效益的投资，可以改善经济成果并减轻财政压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Investing-in-adolescent-mental-health-delivers-long-term-economic-and-social-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Investing-in-adolescent-mental-health-delivers-long-term-economic-and-social-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be02e617-3eec-4863-97e8-ba4744d8bf70 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 05:38:00 -0500 Investing in adolescent mental health delivers long-term economic and social benefits
视网膜血管特征被确定为中风风险的潜在预测因素研究人员确定了视网膜脉管系统的具体特征如何帮助预测个体中风的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Retinal-angio-features-identified-as-潜在-predictors-of-中风-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Retinal-angio-features-identified-as-潜在-预测者-of-中风-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=058ae169-c996-49cf-a139-3fd407d57e07 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 04:52:00 -0500 Retinal vascular features identified as potential predictors of stroke risk
新研究发现大脑神经元驱动脂肪和糖的消耗研究人员发现了背侧 HPC 内不同的神经元群，这些神经元群对某些营养物质有反应并影响肥胖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-study-uncovers-brain-neurons-driven-fat-and-sugar-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-study-uncovers-brain-neurons-driven-fat-and-sugar-conclusion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec57d70a-c008-42c5-9274-0c4f0c4b6c0c Mon, 20 Jan 2025 04:37:00 -0500 New study uncovers brain neurons driving fat and sugar consumption
通过人工智能驱动的模拟重新思考心理健康研究最近的研究强调了生成代理在模拟复杂的社会环境相互作用、改变心理健康研究和干预措施方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Rethinking-mental-health-research-through-AI-driven-simulations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Rethinking-mental-health-research-through-AI-driven-simulations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7da792a7-c99a-40bc-9ab8-4ac13804deb7 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 04:13:00 -0500 Rethinking mental health research through AI-driven simulations
